Human subjects: If Research Ethics Committee and Institutional Review Board approval was required for this article the details would be listed here.
Animal subjects: If there were animal subjects involved in the study the approval number for the research along with protocol approval would be listed here.
If this article was part of a clinical trial the Clinical trial registry and ID would be listed here, for example:
